name: ASKOBAR NETWORK
description: A New Vision for ASKOBAR: ASKOBAR (ASKO) is evolving into a deflationary meme coin deconomy, transitioning into a community powered ecosystem that will support the first meme coin price predictions marketplace on Base. ASKOBAR ZOO Marketplace: ASKOBAR (ASKO) token holders will gain access to prediction powers for popular meme coins, perpetual rate liquid staking, staking rewards boosts, cash stash raffles and DAO style governance. ASKO holders will leverage their price predictions accuracy to earn rewards and premiums, offering a symbiotic relationship between meme coin enthusiasts and the ASKOBAR ecosystem.
